description: The AngularFeed platform will teach students and tech geeks the best angular courses, we proposed full stack development with Firebase (TAFStack) and Node (TANStack).
code:
> ng new project-name;
 > ng serve
 > ng build --prod --aot
 > firebase deploy

testimonials.name: Chandra
testimonials.written: AngularFeed is well covered angular resource. My team and my self are very happy after reading angularfeed material.
